name: opencode-daytona
description: OpenCode plugin that automatically runs all sessions in Daytona sandboxes for isolated, reproducible development environments

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && cp package.json README.md dist/ && cp .npmignore dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd dist && npm pack --dry-run
